name: yoz
text: A comment left by yoz was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by evolume, sevenarts, novacaine)

name: knuckleheadbabylon
text: Photoshop or no, it is so rude to eat all the Rolos.

name: nutmeg
text: A comment left by nutmeg was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Hipjiverobot, Vondicus, Ariamaki, jake11, erributtz, headphones, trisha, _cheesekayke, NDCaesar, aquamuffin, LordPretzel, luckypyjamas, mistlethrush, Breadcrab, mystkmanat, dracer2, Boyd, apres, Madoushi, TheQuietYou, Pigs)

name: sacrificialgoat
text: A comment left by sacrificialgoat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by evolume, Deusoma, TonyHighwind, ohmygooses, NDCaesar, apres)

name: xta
text: A comment left by xta was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by evolume, Deusoma, TonyHighwind, ohmygooses, NDCaesar, apres)

name: wigglestick
text:
Your avatar is the Blacktron II logo.

I am floored.

name: soticoto
text:
It is good, I'll grant, but look just two strips ago.
Seriously.
Readjust your opinion accordingly.

name: snoozebar
text: A comment left by snoozebar was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by evolume, TonyHighwind, ohmygooses, mystkmanat, Mastronaut, STUART)

name: delzhand
text: Best Roomba strip ever.

name: magnumt
text: Noone pisses on the man who invented Photoshop.  Ever.

name: falseprophet
text: Teodor is about to enter a world where the only activity is airbrushing Beef's red-eye.

name: 1000hz
text: Adobe was small-time before the invention of Photoshop.

name: hellaedgar
text: My copy of The Late 20th Century History of Design concurs that this is how the PhotoShop went down.

name: biddlebubbly
text: Brothers Thomas Knoll and John Knoll began development on Photoshop in 1987. Version 1 was released by Adobe in 1990. Early versions of Photoshop were branded as Knoll Software releases before partnership with Adobe was established.

name: fattybeaver
text: Inventing photoshop is HUGE! Why cant I see alt text:(

name: nutmeg
text: man i feel all wrong i just gave you a chubby for your icon.

name: lateadopter
text: You sure it wasn't the other way around?

name: centipede_damascus
text: Clever.

name: straw
text: True

name: nutmeg
text:
OH SHIT!

...i JUST got that

name: rowboat
text: And it only took four months.

name: soticoto
text:
And there was mutual exchange of chub.

It is a hella sweet icon... in his favour.

name: lechatbotte
text: Dude, seriously! Respect for the icon! It's hypnotic....... ..  ..  .    .

name: zapatos
text: and women always ask me what is so great about boobs.  thank you.

name: johnnybaverage
text: Bouncy bouncy bouncy bouncy...

name: never_die
text:
you have to be able to grow that mustache to work at Adobe. it is in your contract.
I also like how we can only see 3/4 of the Roomba in only one panel.

name: aliiis
text:
the way the tips of Beef's ears poke out above his hilarious hairpiece makes it sort of look like he has little horns

I... I don't know how I feel about that

name: radishes
text: So I guess this got slashdotted today. Thankfully it deserves it.

name: awko
text:
The Rolo Kebab:
1. Insert skewer through the centre of an entire pack
2. Remove wrapper
3. Serve.

Stolen from The Idler

name: relaxing
text: Where I come from, the Rolos are individually wrapped in foil.  This makes the Rolo kebab rather impractical.

name: peterjoel
text: Where do you come from? In ENGLAND, the rolos are assembled into a column, and the foil is wrapped around all of them together. The Rolo Kebab is a both practical and easy.

name: steerpike66
text: and delicious.

name: spenham
text: Yeah, as far as I know, here in America they are individually wrapped in foil. So inconvenient.

name: charchar
text: You can still unwrap them once on the skewer. The foil tears quite easily.

name: heccibiggs
text:
What the FUCK. Individually wrapped Rolos? That can just fuck right off.

I like to be able to plough straight through my packs of Rolos.

name: charchar
text: Further incontrovertible proof that America is just a cheap knock-off of England.

name: mattylite
text: What?  What about baseball?  Cricket is like the toddler version of baseball.  Cricket is like someone stared to invent baseball but then just got lazy a quarter of the way through.  Plus, jeans.  We invented jeans.  Don't you wear jeans?  But, ya, I guess I agree, I would like it if Rolos were all stacked in the same foil.  God I would like that a lot.  Also, chinese food.

name: relaxing
text: Cricket, like rugby, is a sport I cannot grasp no matter how many times I watch it or how hard someone tries to explain it to me.

name: heccibiggs
text: To be fair, cricket is totally lame. It's really boring and shitty.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: But not as lame or shitty as individually-wrapped Rolos.  So I think you guys win on this one.

name: farqussus
text: I don't think i can sit here and listen to this.

name: sirfrederick
text: 2 months later: actually, that would be India.

name: lechatbotte
text:
Actually, Blue Denim pants go back to before Columbus. And Levi Strauss wasn't from America. "Blue Jeans" derives from French "Jeans Bleus", which roughly translates "blue Johns".

America may have popularized the FASHION of wearing blue jeans for other than the worst of manual labor, but they really can't claim them as their own invention.

name: zapatos
text: They can claim whatever they want, they are 'MERICA

name: zapatos
text: what About baseball, it sucks.

name: farqussus
text: Your attempts to insult cricket are poorly constructed and would not meet code in a Rio shanty town.

name: rumblefish
text: For reals. Trying to claim that cricket is less complicated than...anything really, is just a frantically waving flag of ignorance.

name: budenhagen
text: Rolos are gross. They stay with you. They're like chocolate gum.

name: cousinted
text: I shall, from now on, celebrate "Fuck you I just invented Photoshop Friday".

name: relaxing
text:
Folks just don't remember the old Adobe logo.
[IMGS OFF]

name: canusdivinus
text: That logo sucks. That definitely needed to get 'shopped.

name: jlowe424
text:
Luckily they listed that feature on the original photoshop box:
"You can also use the airbrush to draw such as a hat"

name: tekende
text: "or just a furious-lookin' ding dong."

name: tbtabby
text: Now they have a special filter for that.

name: jackbandit
text: This strip ranks as one of my favorites.  I think it might have to do with the 'staches, as well as Roastbeef's hilarious dialogue ("You can also use the airbrush to draw such as a hat").

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Damn, Teodor!
Mr. Bear: Back in the stuff.
Little Nephew: webMastah'

name: gussiejives
text: I hope Teodor's about to order Sani-Tacos.

name: brokeaccount
text: Probably not. Eating your own hair is mainly a thing of the mentally ill.

name: zapatos
text: It doesn't even prevent the on-set of headless horsemanship.

name: matthew
text: You don't piss on the dogg that just invented Photoshop.

name: soupkaty
text: wow those are some "sabotage"-lookin fakehairbits

name: mistercake
text: Inventing Photoshop is huge indeed.

name: lolsworth
text: A new dawn in millinery draughtsmanship

name: johnnybaverage
text: I like how "Do you want any" isn't actually a question. It's a foregone conclusion that someone would want tacos.

name: greenkoolayd
text: makes sense.  i almost always dont not want tacos.

name: epicurus
text:
(define (doe-greenkoolayd-want-tacos? t)
(cond
[(>= t 0) true]
[else true]
))

Straight up SCHEME program representing greenkoolayd always wanting tacos? What kind of wacky style am I attempting to rock?

You can only dream of knowing!

name: greenkoolayd
text: what alien language is that?

name: meringue
text: "Screw you for eating all the Rolos" is something I'd like to be able say once in my life.
